column4: i want to install an operating system from a .iso file, and im using ubuntu (new to both VMWare and Ubuntu)
specifically when it says whether I want a virtual drive or i want access to the cd drive in the options to set up the virtual machine. im unable to browse for the iso file
supporting vmware is way out of the scope of this channel
virtualbox is easier and theres a channel on freenode
after spending all that time installing it! is virtualbox better though?
for virtualization use whatever you're comfortable
